name: Too Scary
description:
"When I am too scared of things I close my eyes  and pretend they don't exist."

The game is made in 1 week during  Spooktober Jam 2020.

If  WebGL version is a bit laggy, please, try more stable version for Windows.

Scripting & Level design - Alexander Buslaev

Art - Tatyana Sverdlova

Font: The Unseen (c) Brittney Murphy 2011

Sounds: 

RPG-Sound-Pack

https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-sound-pack

RPG sounds by Kenney Vleugels

Music : soundTeMP - Aeon
